mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jidichanpin_id as jidichanpinId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.jidichanpin_liuyan_content as jidichanpinLiuyanContent ,a.reply_content as replyContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jidichanpin.jidichanpin_name as jidichanpinName ,jidichanpin.jidichanpin_types as jidichanpinTypes ,jidichanpin.jidichanpin_photo as jidichanpinPhoto ,jidichanpin.jidichanpin_content as jidichanpinContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.role as role
FROM jidichanpin_liuyan a left JOIN jidichanpin jidichanpin ON a.jidichanpin_id = jidichanpin.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.jidichanpin_id = #{params.jidichanpinId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.jidichanpin_liuyan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jidichanpinLiuyanContent},'%')
and a.reply_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyContent},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and jidichanpin.jidichanpin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jidichanpinName},'%')
and jidichanpin.jidichanpin_types = #{params.jidichanpinTypes}
and jidichanpin.jidichanpin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jidichanpinContent},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.role like CONCAT('%',#{params.role},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
